After a few hours, service has slowed down, and Lana and Lillie have gone home. I just had no idea... I mean, then of course I have no problem with that, I mean I-I think you’re great too... I just... I...” Mallow trails off, clearly embarrassed by the situation. “I’m sorry if I made you uncomfortable” Ash says, moving over and hugging Mallow, which she awkwardly returns. “I’d hate to ask this Mallow, but it’s quite late, and I’m still feeling a little weak, do you think I could... Mallow goes into the next room to let her parents know that Ash is staying over, though they seem hesitant at first they relent, knowing that Ash is sick.

The pair make their way up to Mallows room, with Mallow being somewhat nervous about having Ash staying there with her. “So, uhmm, we can set up a sleeping bag here? If that’s okay? I love the decorations” he says as he looks around the room, passing by her closet and looking at some of her pictures. “I wish my room was like this” Ash mutters, though Mallow is busy finding a sleeping bag for him and doesn’t notice. Passing by a mirror, Ash gets a good look at himself, and isn’t too happy with what he sees “Man, these clothes sure are boring, and what is the matter with my hair” he says, fidgeting in his outfit, and trying to straighten out his hair. He absentmindedly grabs a band off of Mallows desk, putting it around his wrist.

By now Mallow has set up the sleeping bag, and is routing through her closet, pulling out a pair of her pyjamas. “I’ll go ahead and brush my teeth and get changed in the bathroom, you can feel free to change here” Mallow says smiling. “Oh thank you, I’ll make sure to do that!” Ash says, still unhappy with his reflection.”Wait, she wants me to get changed? Does that mean...” Ash thinks to himself, seeing that Mallows closet is still wide open. “She probably has some spare pyjamas here I can borrow, she pretty much said that I could” He reasons with himself, misunderstanding what Mallow meant by “change”. He quickly strips out of his own clothes, leaving his shorts, top and boxers in a neat pile. Pikachu, who had stayed in the room with him seemed confused by the entire situation, but was too tired to try to stop him.

“Well, I wouldn’t want to go commando in her pyjamas.” Ash says to himself as he pulls out a tight pink, lace pair of panties with floral designs on them. What are...” Mallow says looking stunned, as she sees Ash sitting cross legged on her bed, wearing a pair of pyjamas nearly identical to what she is currently wearing now. “Why... How are... But those are-“ Mallow begins to say but Ash cuts her off “I know they’re yours, I don’t know how I fit in them either. When you said I could get changed I thought you were joking at first, but here I am” he says as he waves a hand over himself. “Thanks for letting me borrow these by the way, without my own pyjamas here I really appreciate it, plus they’re super cute” Ash finished with a wink. Trying to process all of this, Mallow simply sits down next to Ash, too lost for words. He puts an arm around her and rests his head on her shoulder. “I’m so lucky to have someone like you” Ash says, causing Mallow to blush. “Well I... I’m happy you’re here Ash” she says, putting an arm around him. “But I didn’t think you’d wear my pyjamas to bed, I’m glad you think they’re cute, but aren’t they a little girly for you?” She asks, a little worried. “Well they’re girly, but I think they’re really comfy, plus they’re soft, and I quite like how tight they are. I like being in your pants” Ash says with a smirk and a wink. This causes Mallow to blush even deeper than before “Uh I uhh uhmm.. I mean... Thank-thank you I think, yeah uh thanks uh Ash. I’m glad you... Glad you like it, being in my pants that is. It’s getting a bit late though, don’t you think? Let’s call it a night.” Mallow says, untangling herself from Ash. “I guess you’re right, I just wish I could sleep up here, your bed is super comfy” Ash says.as he climbs off, getting his sleeping bag ready.

As he bends over, Mallow can’t help but notice the top of her panties sticking out from the top of the shorts, causing her to blush further. “He’s wearing my panties? What the heck is going on here” Mallow asks herself, getting more and more weirded out by the situation. “Well I guess I’ll go to sleep now, have a great sleep Mallow” Ash says as he leans up and gives her a peck on the cheek, melting her heart slightly. “Oh whatever, he can do what he wants” Mallow thinks to herself, overjoyed by her new found relationship with Ash.

The next morning, the pair awaken at the same time, though Mallow could have sworn Ash always slept in late. “Good morning Mallow! Hope you had a great sleep!” Ash says, looking up at her sweetly. “Morning Ash, I slept well thanks. Sorry to rush out, but we’ve got to get ready for school, I’m going to run in and shower” Mallow says, quickly getting out of bed, and heading out the door.

As Ash lays in his sleeping bag, he hears the shower turn on. He stands up and starts to stretch, loving the pyjamas he’s currently wearing. He sees the discarded outfit that he wore yesterday and looks at it with disdain as he strips from Mallows pyjamas. As he reaches down to pick up his outfit, he stops for a second. Though it did remind me of something I wanted to do at one point.”

Climbing out of bed, he gets together a bowl of cereal and sits down on the sofa with his legs crossed under him. “I haven’t fully decided what I want to do today, if I were to visit the spa that would take up a bit of time, but do I really want to spend my day there? I’m sure if I turned into someone else their personality might push me towards it, but I’m not being pushed by Mays to go” he gets up a few minutes later, cleans his bowl and proceeds to move aside the table that was in the living room, and sets up a camera to record. Smirking to himself, he focuses briefly as his body turns pink.

“Hello there ladies and gentlemen! Tonight we have a special treat: a special fashion show made up of girls that Ash has gotten to know over the years.” The person making this announcement is of course Ash, though the body is very much not his own. Standing in front of the camera is the super model and gym leader Elesa, in her standard high heels, leather leggings and yellow and black dress. “I’ll start things off today for us with a demonstration” Ash says to the camera with a wink, as he proceeds to carry out what can only be considered a professional level catwalk, using Elesa’s modelling skills to walk perfectly in her heels, as well as strike a number of poses, showing off her body and looking as sexy as possible. Carrying this out gave Ash an idea of how he should act when he turns into the other girls, which he rapidly proceeds to do after he’s happy with Elesa.

His first choice is Misty in her original outfit, though as she’s not as confident about her body and is quite tomboyish, the act looks as if she was quite nervous, which Ash found quite endearing. Following his act as Iris, Ash carries on with his mini fashion show for quite a while before switching off the camera, though he’s wearing Lillie’s body in her white bikini. “Oof, I’m tired out after all of that, I need to remember to limit my transformations” he says as he adjusts the string of his bikini. “If Lillie were to call in right now I’d be in so much trouble, she’d probably never forgive me!” He says with a laugh. “I think I’ll rest up for a bit before I head out, though I should change out of this bikini first, and there’s no way I want to wear her regular outfit, I’ve had enough of that dress for now” focusing again, his body turns pink as it reforms into Iris’s.

“I figure if I’m going to relax for a while, it should be in some comfortable clothes” Ash reasons. “This top is light and airy, and her skirt is little more than an accessory.And these leggings are surprisingly comfy, despite how tight they are.” He says, rubbing his hands over his legging encased legs. While sitting around, he found that he was becoming increasingly fidgety, it felt like he couldn’t sit still or he would go mad. “Of course, Iris loves exploring...
